attributes.action: We want more public services in Huntingdonshire located in St. Neots .
attributes.additional_details: Wikipedia:population of Huntingdon is 23,000-population of St. Neots is 40,000
attributes.background: We want to see a fairer distribution of public services in the district. At present all are located in Huntingdon- police station,courts,job centre, benefits office - yet St. Neots has the bigger population. It’s residents pay the biggest proportion of council tax with access to least services.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about something the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

This would be the responsibility of the agencies who run those offices and the local authority.
